con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="http://zed.com/" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tns="http://zed.com/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://zed.com/"> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <xsd:complexType name="resp"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="Resp" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RespArray"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="SOAP-ENC:Array"> <xsd:attribute ref="SOAP-ENC:arrayType" wsdl:arrayType="tns:resp[]" xmlns:wsdl1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="bajaServiciosRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mcorta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="bajaServiciosResponse"> <part name="bajaServiciosResult" type="tns:RespArray"/> </message> <message name="consultaServiciosRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="consultaServiciosResponse"> <part name="consultaServiciosResult" type="xsd:Array"/> </message> <message name="listaNegraRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="action" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="listaNegraResponse"> <part name="listaNegraResult" type="tns:RespArray"/> </message> <message name="altaServicioRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="marcacion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="altaServicioResponse"> <part name="altaServicioResult" type="tns:RespArray"/> </message> <portType name="WsClaroLatamPortType"> <operation name="bajaServicios"> <documentation>Receives a mobile phone number, a service name, the short code number and an access password.<br/> The function's returns the confirmation of Unsubscription of the specified phone number in the specified service.</documentation> <input message="tns:bajaServiciosRequest"/> <output message="tns:bajaServiciosResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="consultaServicios"> <documentation>Receives a mobile number and an access password. <br/> The function's returns the Information of all the subscriptions associated to that mobile number.</documentation> <input message="tns:consultaServiciosRequest"/> <output message="tns:consultaServiciosResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="listaNegra"> <documentation>Receives a mobile phone number and the ACTION to be made in the blacklist (1.Add 2.Delete, 3.Query). <br/> The function returns wheter the ACTION was successful (1) or not (0) .</documentation> <input message="tns:listaNegraRequest"/> <output message="tns:listaNegraResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="altaServicio"> <documentation>Receives a mobile phone number, a keyword, the short code number and an access password. <br> The function's returns the confirmation of Sent Message for suscription of the specified phone number in the specified service..</documentation> <input message="tns:altaServicioRequest"/> <output message="tns:altaServicioResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="WsClaroLatamBinding" type="tns:WsClaroLatamPortType"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="bajaServicios"> <soap:operation soapAction="WsClaroLatam#bajaServicios" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="WsClaroLatam" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="WsClaroLatam" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="consultaServicios"> <soap:operation soapAction="WsClaroLatam#consultaServicios" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="WsClaroLatam" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="WsClaroLatam" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="listaNegra"> <soap:operation soapAction="WsClaroLatam#listaNegra" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="WsClaroLatam" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="WsClaroLatam" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="altaServicio"> <soap:operation soapAction="WsClaroLatam#altaServicio" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="WsClaroLatam" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="WsClaroLatam" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="WsClaroLatam"> <port name="WsClaroLatamPort" binding="tns:WsClaroLatamBinding"> <soap:address location="http://wpclaro.zed.com/external/WsClaroLatam/WsClaroLatam.php"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
